content: limestone one skein shawl by michelle miller 2010 st s = stitch es rs = right side ws = wrong side pattern notes this shawl is constructed of a main body with a knit-on lace edging the body is constructed in a traditional triangle method beginning with chart a then moving to chart b after there are 25 sts the knit-on edging begins with chart c working to description the marked center stitch of the body short row are used to shape the edging around the center this quick-to-knit triangle lace shawlette is simple point of the body written instructions are and elegant with its lovely knit-on lace edging provided for all charts so you may work from the charts or the written instructions for more needles information on knitted lace triangle construction size us 6/4 mm knitting
